CompanyName.label: Company Name
CompanyName.value: Vantage Corp Class A Ordinary Shares

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Vantage Corp was founded in 2012 by five seasoned shipbrokers with a mission of providing exceptional shipbroking services. We commenced operations with a team of over 20 specialists proficient in their various roles in the tanker markets which involves trading different types of oil and petrochemical products through vessel transportation, including clean petroleum products and petrochemicals. Over the years, we underwent significant growth and evolution, expanding our shipbroking services to cover dirty petroleum products, biofuels and vegetable oils. Additionally we established a sales & projects team, a research/strategy team and an IT team. We have expanded to over 50 dedicated professionals as of May 2024, with offices in both Singapore and Dubai.
